Source.Name: yq
Source.Summary: yq is a lightweight command-line YAML processor
Source.Description: A lightweight and portable command-line YAML processor. yq uses jq like syntax but works with yaml files as well as json. It doesn't yet support everything jq does - but it does support the most common operations and functions, and more is being added continuously.
